title: What are the steps to becoming pro?
body: Is there people I need to contact or do I need to participate in specific things? Please let me know.

replies.body: Practice is the first step, but it'd be worth the time to watch some pro's or higher end players on twitch and such to see some of the choices they make or how they react to situations while in game!

practice, practice, practice and always keep aiming for better, train, learn your mechanics, play a lot of ranked and in a few years if you still love the game you should be at least diamond no problem. If you're lucky enough to get t master or challenger tier, then look into getting into the competitive scene, I'm just a lowly bronze squire but good luck out there!
